        Returns:

      • findRail

        public abstract com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.bases.IntVector3 findRail(MinecartMember<?> member,

                                                       com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.bases.IntVector3 pos)
        Tries to find this Rail Type near the Minecart at the Block position specified.
        Parameters:

        world - the Minecart is in
        pos - of the Minecart
        Returns:
        the Rail position (of this type) the Minecart is on

      • findRail

        public abstract org.bukkit.block.Block findRail(org.bukkit.block.Block pos)
        Tries to find this Rail Type near a 'next' Block returned by getNextPos(Block, BlockFace). Unlike findRail(MinecartMember, World, IntVector3) this method does not allow special adjustments based on Minecart information.
        Parameters:
        pos - Block a Minecart is 'at'
        Returns:
        the rail of this type, or null if not found

      • findMinecartPos

        public abstract org.bukkit.block.Block findMinecartPos(org.bukkit.block.Block trackBlock)
        Gets the Block where a Minecart would be if it was using this rail. This is the inverse of findRail(Block).
        Parameters:
        trackBlock - where this Rail Type is at
        Returns:
        Minecart position

      • getPossibleDirections

        public abstract org.bukkit.block.BlockFace[] getPossibleDirections(org.bukkit.block.Block trackBlock)
        Gets an array containing all possible directions a Minecart can move on the trackBlock.
        Parameters:
        trackBlock - to use
        Returns:
        all possible directions the Minecart can move

      • getNextPos

        public abstract org.bukkit.block.Block getNextPos(org.bukkit.block.Block currentTrack,
                                org.bukkit.block.BlockFace currentDirection)
        Gets the next Block while moving on this type of Rail. The goal of this method is to find out where Minecarts that enter this rail end up at when moving forward.

        If the result is null, then this Rail Type forcibly disallows that direction from being used, and no movement was possible.

        Parameters:
        currentTrack - of this rail type the 'Minecart' is using to drive on
        currentDirection - the 'Minecart' is moving
        Returns:
        next Block to go to after moving over this rail

      • getDirection

        public abstract org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getDirection(org.bukkit.block.Block railsBlock)
        Obtains the direction of this type of Rails. This is the direction along minecarts move.
        Parameters:
        railsBlock - to get it for
        Returns:
        rails Direction

      • getSignColumnDirection

        public abstract org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getSignColumnDirection(org.bukkit.block.Block railsBlock)

      • getLogic

        public abstract RailLogic getLogic(MinecartMember<?> member,
                 org.bukkit.block.Block railsBlock)
        Obtains the Rail Logic to use for the Minecart at the (previously calculated) rail position in a World.
        Parameters:
        member - to get the logic for
        railsBlock - the Minecart is driving on
        Returns:
        Rail Logic

      • onPreMove

        public void onPreMove(MinecartMember<?> member)
        Called right before a Minecart is moved from one point to the other. This is called after the pre-movement updates performed by rail logic.
        Parameters:
        member - that is about to be moved

      • onPostMove

        public void onPostMove(MinecartMember<?> member)
        Called right after a Minecart was moved from one point to the other. This is called after the post-movement updates performed by rail logic.
        Parameters:
        member - that just moved

      • onCollide

        public boolean onCollide(MinecartMember<?> with,
                org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                org.bukkit.block.BlockFace hitFace)
        Handles collision with this Rail Type
        Parameters:
        with - Minecart that his this Rail
        block - of this Rail
        hitFace - of this Rail
        Returns:
        True if collision is allowed, False if not

      • onBlockCollision

        public boolean onBlockCollision(MinecartMember<?> member,
                       org.bukkit.block.Block railsBlock,
                       org.bukkit.block.Block hitBlock,
                       org.bukkit.block.BlockFace hitFace)
        Handles a Minecart colliding with a Block while using this Rail Type.
        Parameters:
        member - that collided
        railsBlock - the member is driving on
        hitBlock - the Minecart hit
        hitFace - the Minecart hit
        Returns:
        True if collision is allowed, False if not
